message.raw:
Save Mercurial revision data of labscript file in h5 file instead of SVN.
Seems appropriate as we migrated labscript source to Mercurial in January 2013.
Chances are that most user side code, e.g. labscript_suite/userlib/labscriptlib
will be under Mercurial control, as has been the case @ Monash since June 2014.
